function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Constantly changing policies between private and public measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modeling assumptions for interventions, lockdowns with a 7-day delay in implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stable compliance with a package of \\\\u2019barrier gestures\\\\u2019 compared to individual components","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in modeling the impact of school closure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Oversimplification of the impact of partially opening schools","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification problem due to curfew timing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding regarding the impact of weather conditions on transmission rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confusion bias between weather conditions and variant of concern voc","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential overfitting of complex models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the hospitalization period dh and its impact on disease spread in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex mathematical modeling approach may lead to errors in estimating the effective reproductive ratio r_eff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the estimation of the effective reproductive ratio r_eff due to complex model dynamics and parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission rate estimation may be inaccurate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Model comparison may lead to incorrect conclusions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of outdated or invalid models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative association between closure of bars and restaurants and transmission rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for weather variable in the initial model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large aic for model 4 compared to other models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired covid-19 due to airborne transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of other microbial bioaerosols","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air changes in \\\\u2019surge\\\\u2019 wards and intensive care units icu .","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of engineering solutions for improving ventilation and air sterilization.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low awareness of the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in reducing the spread of sars-cov-2 ward.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capture of airborne viruses","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogen detection and circulation of sars-cov-2 in hospital environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agreed standard for sampling and detection of airborne viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol generating procedures increasing respiratory aerosols","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of
